content.raw:
Running the robot localization every 2 seconds problems are logged with the message:

“Transform from X2\_1/base\_link/imu\_sensor to X2\_1 was unavailable for the time requested. Using latest instead.”

The calculations of this node are done 50 time per second and only exactly every 2 seconds this error occurs. So there seems to be a process that is using much time every 2 seconds that leads to these errors.

The attached log shows this 2-second period. \(It was created during a run with debug parameter set.\)

Such messages do not show up in the Gazebo Version only in Ignition. So there seems to be a problem.

The calculations of this node are done 50 time per second and only exactly every 2 seconds this error occurs. So there seems to be a process that is using much time every 2 seconds that leads to these errors.

The attached log shows this 2-second period. (It was created during a run with debug parameter set.)

Such messages do not show up in the Gazebo Version only in Ignition. So there seems to be a problem.
